definitions.text: a compound with which fabrics are treated to repel water
a chemical substance that repels animals

examples: she knew many repellents to his advances
he became rebarbative and prickly and spiteful

definitions.text: highly offensive; arousing aversion or disgust
examples: the idea of eating meat is repellent to me

definitions.text: incapable of absorbing or mixing with
examples: plastic highly resistant to steam and water
